title: The Great British Bake Off 2019 final, recap: A rollercoaster of meltdowns, family dramas and shock results
text:
Over the past nine weeks, a baker’s dozen of floury-fingered hopefuls had been whittled down to just three - favourite Steph, steady Alice and underdog David - but only one could become champion.

Here’s everything that happened in a tear-sodden climactic episode…

Eternal bridesmaid David was crowned champion

The perennial runner-up finally went one better. Last man standing David Atherton had come second in the technical challenge a remarkable six times in nine weeks and somehow reached the final without ever being crowned Star Baker. Yet likeable underdog David went up a level when it mattered most and deservedly lifted that coveted glass cake-stand trophy.

The 36-year-old succeeds reigning...
description: Over the past nine weeks, a baker’s dozen of floury-fingered hopefuls had been whittled down to just three  - favourite Steph, steady Alice and underdog David - but only one could become champion.
